languages.text: Друкари наслаждаются резней, пока слуги Вольного Торговца следят за ними. Наконец, ксеносов истребляют в акте праведного отмщения. На их кораблях остается богатая добыча.

While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.
languages.original_text: Друкари наслаждаются резней, пока слуги Вольного Торговца следят за ними. Наконец, ксеносов истребляют в акте праведного отмщения. На их кораблях остается богатая добыча.

traits.locale_text: While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.
The militia is more than a match for the xenos — the latter are forced to retreat empty-handed.

While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.
The militia is more than a match for the xenos — the latter are forced to retreat empty-handed.
The militia is more than a match for the xenos — the latter are forced to retreat empty-handed.

While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.

While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.

While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.

languages.text: Pendant que les Drukharis se délectent du massacre, les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en profitent pour les observer attentivement. Au bout du compte, les xénos reçoivent leur juste châtiment et sont exterminés, laissant derrière eux les trésors entassés dans les cales de leurs vaisseaux.
languages.original_text: While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.

traits.locale_text: Pendant que les Drukharis se délectent du massacre, les serviteurs {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en profitent pour les observer attentivement. Au bout du compte, les xénos reçoivent leur juste châtiment et sont exterminés, laissant derrière eux les trésors entassés dans les cales de leurs vaisseaux.

languages.text: デュカーリが殺戮を楽しんでいる間、自由開拓者の従者たちは注意深く彼らを観察していた。ついに異種族はその船に豊かな戦利品を残したまま、正義の報復行為で駆逐された。
languages.original_text: While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.

traits.locale_text: デュカーリが殺戮を楽しんでいる間、自由開拓者の従者たちは注意深く彼らを観察していた。ついに異種族はその船に豊かな戦利品を残したまま、正義の報復行為で駆逐された。

languages.text: 当黑暗灵族忙于享受杀戮时，行商浪人的仆人却在仔细观察他们的一举一动。到了最后，黑暗灵族在正义的报复行动中被全员歼灭，而行商浪人得到了丰厚的战利品。
languages.original_text: While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.

traits.locale_text: 当黑暗灵族忙于享受杀戮时，行商浪人的仆人却在仔细观察他们的一举一动。到了最后，黑暗灵族在正义的报复行动中被全员歼灭，而行商浪人得到了丰厚的战利品。

languages.text: Mientras los Drukhari disfrutan de la matanza, los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente los observan cuidadosamente. Al fin, los xenos son exterminados en justa venganza, dejando el lucrativo botín de sus naves.
languages.original_text: While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.

traits.locale_text: Mientras los Drukhari disfrutan de la matanza, los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente los observan cuidadosamente. Al fin, los xenos son exterminados en justa venganza, dejando el lucrativo botín de sus naves.

languages.text: Während die Drukhari das Gemetzel genießen, beobachten die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sie genau. Endlich werden die Xenos durch einen Akt der rechtschaffenen Vergeltung ausgelöscht. Auf ihren Schiffen bleibt reiche Beute zurück.
languages.original_text: While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.

traits.locale_text: Während die Drukhari das Gemetzel genießen, beobachten die Diener {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sie genau. Endlich werden die Xenos durch einen Akt der rechtschaffenen Vergeltung ausgelöscht. Auf ihren Schiffen bleibt reiche Beute zurück.

languages.text: Drukhariler katliamın keyfini sürerken Hür Tacir'in hizmetkârları onları dikkatle gözlemliyor. Nihayetinde haklı bir intikam ateşiyle kökü kurutulan zenolar, gemilerinde bolca ganimet bırakıyor.
languages.original_text: While the Drukhari are enjoying the slaughter, the Rogue Trader's servants carefully observe them. At last, the xenos are exterminated in an act of righteous retribution, leaving behind rich spoils on board their ships.
